snippet.title: A Long Road Home - Gameplay teaser 1
snippet.description:
A short clip from One Bit Studio's debut game, A Long Road Home. When you need some information, visiting the tavern is always a good idea.

Free demo available here:
https://01bitstudio.itch.io/a-long-road-home

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/01bitstudio

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/01bitstudio/
